title: Data extraction
snippet:
Need to extract data from upto 20 web page into excel monthly. Therefore I also need a automation that will download the data from web to excel every mouth. The data in the web is in the table format. I  need all the table to be transferred to an excel file.

The url's:
http://www.finnet.com.tr/f2000plus/Hisse/HisseKapanis/Hisse-Kapanislari/XU100 http://www.finnet.com.tr/f2000plus/FinansalAnaliz/PiyasaCarpanlari

The table format I need is attahced
